page.content:
The farms are{highly mechanised and employ few labourers (2 to 4 full time staff and 0 to 6 seasonal) All own modern automated{milking parlours, {tractors, ploughs, drills, dung {spreaders, cutters, turners, bailers and{trailers}and make use of{combines and{crop spraying.
All farmers questioned very much {enjoyed their work,}especially the freedom, the isolation and the outdoor nature of the work. Their few{dislikes}included the pressure put on by never ending animal husbandry, the long working days, the milk quotas, rain and searching for lost animals.
